feed.title: PolyGen Game
feed.subtitle: The PolyGen game using RFID cards to capture devices

entry.title: 39C3 Game Results
entry.summary: 39C3 is over and so we must analyse the stats from the PolyGen game! General Stats Total players: 1,681 Total players scoring over 1,000 points: 1,134 Total players score: 11,392,010 Total unit captures: 30,294 Total unit visits: 33,164 Total output boosts: 2,899 Players who set a codename: 257 Players too lazy to set a codename: 1,424 Maximum Units Online: 36 Units Faile...

entry.title: PolyGen at 39C3
entry.summary: Polybius Biotech are pleased to announce the deployment of PolyGen portable fusion generates across the 39C3 event site. How to play To play you simply need an RFID card. Most cards will work, although anything that generates a dynamic identifier such as mobile phones and some bank cards will not work. Your objective is to keep as many of the units aligned to your team as possible. You can...

entry.title: PolyGen at WAMP
entry.summary: Polybius Biotech are pleased to announce the deployment of PolyGen portable fusion generates across the WAMP2025 event site. How to play To play you simply need an RFID card. Most cards will work, although anything that generates a dynamic identifier such as mobile phones, WHY payment card or some bank cards will not work. Your objective is to keep as many of the units aligned to your team as...
